description: Targetome experimental evidence table, providing experimental support for Targetome interactions. More information can be found here: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5759325/. Data was downloaded from the Targetome Git repository (https://github.com/ablucher/The-Cancer-Targetome) in July 2021.

fields.name: expID
fields.description: ID for experimental evidence supporting Targetome interactions

fields.name: exp_assayType
fields.description: Assay type used for experimental evidence

fields.name: exp_assayUnits
fields.description: Units of measurement for experimental assay

fields.name: exp_assayRelation
fields.description: Relation of values for experimental assay

fields.name: exp_parentSource
fields.description: Source from which experimental assay was obtained

fields.name: sourceID
fields.description: ID for source of supporting Targetome evidence

fields.name: databaseName
fields.description: Name of database from which supporting evidence and literature are obtained

fields.name: db_downloadURL
fields.description: URL from which database was downloaded

fields.name: db_downloadDate
fields.description: Date on which database was downloaded
